title: Life, Love and the Pursuit Of: I Won't Give Up, If You Don't Give Up.
description: In Life, Love and the Pursuit Of, the author walks us through some of our universal challenges, using her own personal experiences as a guide. With great candor, she offers tangible advice, instilling within readers compassion, inspiration, and most of all optimism. For anyone who has ever felt alone in their struggle, Life, Love and the Pursuit Of offers a powerful reminder that you are not.
author: Acamea Deadwiler
